titles.title: To designate the United States Courthouse to be constructed in Jackson, Mississippi, as the "R. Jess Brown United States Courthouse".

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Transportation and Infrastructure.

bill.summary: Designates a certain U.S. courthouse to be built in Jackson, Mississippi, as the "R. Jess Brown United States Courthouse."
